pedestal.name: A Very Special Message From Dredmor
pedestal.text: Welcome hero! I do so hope that your stay in my dungen is ... enjoyed. Consider the gift ahead my little way of making sure that you are quickly ... seasoned to the wonderful times we have ahead of us.

pedestal.name: A Very Special Message From Dredmor
pedestal.text: Welcome hero! I do so hope that your stay in my dungen is ... enjoyed. Consider the gift ahead my little way of making sure that you are quickly ... seasoned to the wonderful times we have ahead of us.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames seem a little too eager to shine light over you.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'The next person to eat my jam I will MAKE jam out of!'

customblocker.description: There are crumbs and greasy stains all over this table.

customblocker.name: Secret Note
customblocker.description: These are not the lich's halls. I know this, for I have walked his footsteps for days and the burrowing of diggles comes second only to my heartbeat in marking the flow of time. Yet these design feel familiar, as if I had seen them in a dream, and then forgotten, or perhaps the dream is yet to come. It is dark here and my breath grows ragged. That is enough to sleep.

customblocker.name: Stone Coffin
customblocker.description: Here lies Tanya the Tinkerer, buried with her toys so that they may play with her forever in the afterlife and also not kill any more inventive children.

customblocker.name: Stone Coffin
customblocker.description: Here lies Tanya the Tinkerer, buried with her toys so that they may play with her forever in the afterlife and also not kill any more inventive children.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Yeek log, day 36. I did not think my cunning plan all the way through.'

customblocker.name: Stone Sarcophagus
customblocker.description: The sarcophagus is rigged with tripwires. Best leave this one be.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles still burn strongly.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles still burn strongly.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: Nobody has cared for these candles in a long time.

customblocker.name: Fresh Skeleton
customblocker.description: A worryingly recent addition.

customengraving.name: Old Bones
customengraving.description: All that remains of a past slaughter.

customengraving.name: Old Bones
customengraving.description: All that remains of a past slaughter.

customblocker.name: Stone Sarcophagus
customblocker.description: More than one body has been crammed inside.

customblocker.name: Stone Sarcophagus
customblocker.description: More than one body has been crammed inside.

customblocker.name: Stone Sarcophagus
customblocker.description: More than one body has been crammed inside.

customblocker.name: Ransacked Grave
customblocker.description: You snooze, you lose.

customblocker.name: Ransacked Grave
customblocker.description: You snooze, you lose.

customblocker.name: Ransacked Grave
customblocker.description: You snooze, you lose.

customblocker.name: Secret Note
customblocker.description: Smoldering stone scalds my fingertips even now as I scrape chalk dust into oily flasks. There is not a living soul in sight, and fewer dead ones than I had expected to unbottle my magicks on. Does the lich desecrate his own dungeon to spite me? They said I was the first and last willing hero to dare this place in a generation. Who else, then, has taken blade and blazes to its walls?

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'WARNING! Don protective gear and seal all airlocks before exiting to surface!'

action.text: Whoosh! A foul stench hits your nose, but at least the air is breathable.
What are you doing out here? Get back inside you silly little hero.

customblocker.name: Annoying Voltaic Luminescence Lamp
customblocker.description: Just die already! Geez.

customblocker.name: Flickering Glass Square
customblocker.description: This screensaver is functioning perfectly, thanks for asking.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: Is thing even still working? Who knows?

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: Is thing even still working? Who knows?

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'So, those AI workers taking our jobs, huh?'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Lord Dredmor is watching ...'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'IIII- IIII- IIII- II'

customblocker.name: Damaged Voltaic Luminescence Lamp
customblocker.description: Cracks are spread over the surface.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: Whatever else it is, it's obviously not an effective alarm system.

customblocker.name: Mysterious Watered Dirt Cube
customblocker.description: Utterly baffling.

customblocker.name: Mysterious Watered Dirt Cube
customblocker.description: Utterly baffling.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It thinks, therefore it is.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It thinks, therefore it is.

customengraving.name: Billowing Smoke
customengraving.description: Thick, harmless smoke rises from the floor.

customengraving.name: Billowing Smoke
customengraving.description: Thick, harmless smoke rises from the floor.

customengraving.name: Billowing Smoke
customengraving.description: Thick, harmless smoke rises from the floor.

customengraving.name: Billowing Smoke
customengraving.description: Thick, harmless smoke rises from the floor.

customengraving.name: Billowing Smoke
customengraving.description: Thick, harmless smoke rises from the floor.

customblocker.name: Abandoned Workbench
customblocker.description: This workbench looks to have been left in a hurry.

customblocker.name: Dirty Bookshelf
customblocker.description: Smeared grime marks places where books have been hastily snatched.

customblocker.name: Lazy Voltaic Luminescence Lamp
customblocker.description: It deserves a good smack, that one does.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Test subject 07 recorded frothing at the mouth. Clear sign of mental deficiency, and therefore, harmlessness.'

customblocker.name: Flickering Glass Square
customblocker.description: Either this next door is a portal to a wintery wonderland, or ...

customblocker.name: Flickering Glass Square
customblocker.description: Either this next door is a portal to a wintery wonderland, or ...

customblocker.name: Blinking Voltaic Luminescence Lamp
customblocker.description: It takes you a moment to realise that it's actually blinking 'I HATE YOU' in morse code.

customblocker.name: Secret Note
customblocker.description: Beak and breath! Beak and breath! Nightmares and fantasy twisted together into flesh! I am not safe here, but I dare not run until I have recovered from the maw of the last abomination to lay ambush. They are not of the lich's kin, I am sure. Nor any natural beast horde of this world. Madness! A pox of the mind! Were my arm not aching, I would say I was dying. Anything but these!

pedestal.name: Warning To Thrusties
pedestal.text: The 'happy ending' is that I don't drown all you ungrateful punks! Stay out!

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Thrusties rule, mustaches drool!'

customblocker.name: Massage Table
customblocker.description: Several folded towels are stored underneath this table.

customblocker.name: Massage Table
customblocker.description: Several folded towels are stored underneath this table.

customblocker.name: Massage Table
customblocker.description: Several folded towels are stored underneath this table.

customblocker.name: Short Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: Bottles of different massage oils cover this bench. Some have stray hairs floating in them.

customblocker.name: Short Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: Bottles of different massage oils cover this bench. Some have stray hairs floating in them.

customblocker.name: Short Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: Bottles of different massage oils cover this bench. Some have stray hairs floating in them.

customblocker.name: Short Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: Bottles of different massage oils cover this bench. Some have stray hairs floating in them.

customblocker.name: Table
customblocker.description: This table is covered with scratched notes of chemical equations. Most of them are wrong.

customblocker.name: Shiny Bin
customblocker.description: At no point has any mistaken sludge or bodily wastage been placed in this bin.

customblocker.name: Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: An alchemy workbench. Foul smells arise from out-of-date bottles.

customblocker.name: Short Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: An alchemy workbench. Holes have been burned through the wood in various places.

customblocker.name: Alchemist's Still
customblocker.description: This probably explains why your father is so deathly afraid of you falling in the water here.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'The lifeguard is: OUT'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Left: slow lane. Right: conga lane.'

customblocker.name: Secret Note
customblocker.description: In my panic, I have lost count of hours and with them days. The lich has escaped me, or, he has escaped the invaders. They spread through the dungeon as lava spreads, slowly, without purpose, but burying all. The minions who once opposed me now cower, scattered, in dark corners. I delve freely, if nothing else. My King would not believe me. These dungeons become my home.

customblocker.name: Fish Water Fountain
customblocker.description: Water pours from its stone gills. It drowns so that you may enjoy fine art.

customblocker.name: Fork Water Fountain
customblocker.description: Water pours from its stone tines. A solemn reminder that fish are not only beautiful, but delicious. This statue wobbles a little.

customblocker.name: Penguin Water Fountain
customblocker.description: Water pours from its stone beak. Try not to imagine it as vomit.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker to some unseen movement.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker to some unseen movement.

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: A book on military tactics sticks partially out, its chapter on ambushes dog-eared.

pedestal.name: Library Rules
pedestal.text: 1) No eating, drinking, or photosynthesizing in the library. 2) Treat books as you would treat your face if you if you had bricks for hands. 3) STFU.

customblocker.name: Neat Shelves
customblocker.description: These shelves are so well organised that you're afraid of touching anything.

customblocker.name: Neat Shelves
customblocker.description: These shelves are so well organised that you're afraid of touching anything.

customblocker.name: Neat Shelves
customblocker.description: These shelves are so well organised that you're afraid of touching anything.

customblocker.name: Neat Shelves
customblocker.description: These shelves are so well organised that you're afraid of touching anything.

customblocker.name: Small Shelves
customblocker.description: The top shelf has been recently eaten.

customblocker.name: Neat Shelves
customblocker.description: These shelves are so well organised that you're afraid of touching anything.

customblocker.name: Library Records
customblocker.description: A long list of late fees dominates the file ... Owch, no wonder Lord Dredmor always hides so deep in the dungeon.

customblocker.name: Clear Table
customblocker.description: This table is so clean it would probably kick you in the shins if you tried to lean on it.

customblocker.name: Clear Table

customblocker.description: This table is so clean it would probably kick you in the shins if you tried to lean on it.

customengraving.name: Pentagram
customengraving.description: One line is broken where the wood has frozen and cracked.

customengraving.name: Ritual Candles
customengraving.description: Even unlit, the candles carry a foul smell.

customengraving.name: Ritual Candles
customengraving.description: Even unlit, the candles carry a foul smell.

customengraving.description: Even unlit, the candles carry a foul smell.

customblocker.name: Dank Shelves
customblocker.description: Powders, chalk, and what look suspiciously like organs are on these shelves.

customblocker.name: Dank Shelves
customblocker.description: These books are written in a tongue unknown to you. Blood splatters cover some pages.

customblocker.name: Dank Shelves
customblocker.description: Powders, chalk, and what look suspiciously like organs are on these shelves.

customblocker.name: Dank Shelves
customblocker.description: These books are written in a tongue unknown to you. Blood splatters cover some pages.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'The dust bunnies have teeth!'

customblocker.name: Dusty Shelves
customblocker.description: Stacked tomes brimming with ancient knowledge of little to no practical value with today's scientific progression.

customblocker.name: Adult Shelves
customblocker.description: Some serious literature for the adults to read while the kiddies are busy. And by serious you mean borderline pornographic.

customblocker.name: Magazine Shelves
customblocker.description: Topical magazines. Stacks of them. The most recent warns that murders are, ah, heh, up.

customblocker.name: Prop Shelves
customblocker.description: Learning isn't fun unless you're hitting somebody over the head with a nerf sword.

customblocker.name: Prop Shelves
customblocker.description: Is that ... a doll with your face on it? It looks pinpricked and worn out.

customblocker.name: Table
customblocker.description: This is a table.

customblocker.name: Table
customblocker.description: This is also a table.

customblocker.name: Table
customblocker.description: This is not a table. Just kidding, it's a table.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: Can you spell the word 'candle' for me?

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: Can you spell the word 'candle' for me?

customblocker.name: Children Shelves
customblocker.description: The colouring books are stained with blood and ichor way outside of the lines.

customblocker.name: Children Shelves
customblocker.description: A book of fairy tales tells the anecdote of a diggle who refused to clean his room and was then slaughter by a hero. So far as you can tell, every chapter ends like this.

customblocker.name: Poster
customblocker.description: 'If you can successfully read this, congratulations! Get back to work.'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Back to work you slackers, big D wants these shelves in place by evening!'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Did somebody say skinny dipping water polo on floor 4??'

customblocker.name: Empty Shelves
customblocker.description: These shelves have been abandoned here by Dredmor's minions.

action.text: Whoops! You barely avoid tripping over an odd, roughly round indentation in the floorboards.

action.name: Secret Note
action.description: We play a game, these eyes and I. They seal my magic, and I shred their evil with stolen flails. It is not only they who watch; I see the tracks of the elves, the trails of Qzlyuoptesse, so I have named them, so I shall hunt them. I think they are but monsters of a different realm, and I a hero of this one. My King must now think me dead, but there is duty here beyond the lich.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: 'Please Do Not Litter.'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Follow the left wall, just keep your hand on the left wall ...'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'nnsweenes, or was it nnsweense? Argh, I don't even'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'I dropped it right here, I only took two steps, where did it go?!'

customblocker.name: Secret Note
customblocker.description: They come from portals I dare observe little, torn through earth as a Fulminaric Bolt tears through sky, but from somewhere far distant, so far I wonder if you could ever touch it, gently, while gripping a vengeful dagger. The lich has not this power, nor I. To what purpose is this invasion, here and now? Only monsters step through with only monsters to fight. And the lich. And I.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Now we are all spawns of diggles.'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'CASTLE YEEK'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'No stinky liches allowed!'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Elemental Empowerment'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Magical Sources'

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'Powerless Yellow Crud Depository'

customblocker.name: Short Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: The potions and powders here would be fatal to a non-yeek, and probably to a yeek as well.

customblocker.name: Alchemist's Still
customblocker.description: Your skin freezes, tingles, itches, mopes, and much more as you draw near.

action.text: The wooden gates creak slowly half-open, then with a sudden crash collapse into sawdust.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'You found the secret. HEROIC PRAGMATISM!'

customblocker.name: Detailed Drawing
customblocker.description: The details in this sketch are uncomfortably accurate.

customblocker.name: Detailed Drawing
customblocker.description: The details in this sketch are uncomfortably accurate.

customblocker.name: Detailed Drawing
customblocker.description: The details in this sketch are uncomfortably accurate.

customblocker.name: Detailed Drawing
customblocker.description: The details in this sketch are uncomfortably accurate.

customblocker.name: Amateur Butchery Project
customblocker.description: 'NOT THE HERO' is carved into its skull.

customblocker.name: Secret Note
customblocker.description: For every monster I burn, another emerges. For every wound I inflict, the danger grows. Stalkers sink out of visibility, vortices form from unstable compounds, mimics learn ever the more devious tricks. I have precious time left in this mortal body. The lich must mock me where he hides, but he, and I, and my King, I fear we shall all soon be dust together beneath this wave.

customblocker.name: Rusty Ol' Bin
customblocker.description: Rust: At least it's not acid! (TM)

customblocker.name: Rusty Ol' Bin
customblocker.description: Rest in peace, ol' Rusty.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles sputter in the damp air.

customengraving.name: Candles

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles sputter in the damp air.

customblocker.name: Ancient Smelter
customblocker.description: Deep magic has preserved this ancient smelter from the ravanges of time.

customblocker.name: Ancient Smelter
customblocker.description: Deep magic has preserved this ancient smelter from the ravanges of time.

customblocker.name: Ancient Still
customblocker.description: Even centuries later, it still glows faintly from elixers once mixed.

customblocker.name: Ancient Rusty Bin
customblocker.description: Even godlike precursor races have bad days.

customblocker.name: Ancient Mystic Rack
customblocker.description: It only appears wooden to your undeveloped, spiritually-closed eyes.

customblocker.name: Ancient Omnipurpose Workbench
customblocker.description: It's like the swiss army knife of workbenches.

customblocker.name: Ancient Table
customblocker.description: Some things never change.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'In case of dungeon collapse: Break glass and go crazy!'

customengraving.description: The candles flicker innocently at you.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames burn deliberately in their little nook.

action.text: Oh no! This shrine was really just a Clever Mimic in disguise!
Oh no! This shrine was really just a Clever Mimic in disguise!
Oh no! This shrine was really just a Clever Mimic in disguise!
Oh no! This shrine was really just a Clever Mimic in disguise!
Oh no! This shrine was really just a Clever Mimic in disguise!

customblocker.name: Secret Note
customblocker.description: There are some things that cannot be unseen. The face of a gorgon through stony eyes. A glimpse of the lich, blinking away from a mold crackling with magic. A kiwi bird and a diggle, side by side. Vestigial wings, hanging. Long beaks, touching. A few generations apart, surely, and no more. This invasion was from no impossible dimension. They were not once demons. They were us.

customblocker.name: Flyer
customblocker.description: It's an advertisment for the River Styx Bianual Barbecue. (BYO souls)

customengraving.name: Billowing Smoke
customengraving.description: Thick, harmless smoke rises from the floor.

customblocker.name: Secret Note
customblocker.description: There is nowhere left to flee. It is too late to hide. To fight is to die for no power of this age can withstand them. They mass on every stone step, waiting perhaps for a sign, or their own dreams, to ascend and destroy the naive kingdom above. But I shall not be the lich, ever The Baron, bowing and scraping for his new masters. Yet nor shall I perish without reason. There is one final hall to walk.

customblocker.name: Crushed Skeleton
customblocker.description: You could drizzle maple syrup on this poor guy and call him breakfast.

action.text: You hear a faint click then fruitless grinding. Lucky for you, this trap was broken.
The room continues to hum. This machine has been powered long before you arrived ...

customengraving.name: Unused Pentagram
customengraving.description: Looks like you got here just in the nick of time.

customblocker.name: Secret Note
customblocker.description: It seems an age since I have seen the sun. A portal beckons, and with it time, true ages to gather power that might crush the invasion or, if naught else, control it within these damned dungeons. For my King, though he abandons me, I shall do what I must. I shall become what I must. Know that I am Dredmor, and I surrender the surface in every way but in my heart and to these fiends.

customblocker.name: Slipgate
customblocker.description: Is this from whence Dredmor came, or where he flees when he hears you coming? This slipgate keeps its secrets.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles just scream ominous.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles just scream ominous.

customblocker.name: Foolish Hero
customblocker.description: Who dared stand before Lord Dredmor.
